column15:
The packet loss was caused by jitter on the backbone EIE line, 
which impacted the customer’s service. The jitter led to brief 
periods of packet loss before traffic was successfully 
switched to an alternative route.
column16:
Traffic was switched to an alternative route (SGIX) to mitigate the 
impact.
